name: Minecraft - Last City of the Aztecs
name_original: Minecraft - Last City of the Aztecs
description:
From 1300 to 1521 a powerful tribe dominated large parts of Mesoamerica, the Aztecs.
In 1519 a small group of Spanish conquistadors led by Hernán Cortés arrived and  in  1521 captured the Aztec emperor Cuauhtemoc. 
But on a remote island a small Aztec city reject the conquistador's assault and fight for their beliefs.
Who will you help in this battle? Or do you want to take all the riches for yourself?

W,A,S,D to walk

Spacebar to jump

Shift to run

Mouse to aim

Mouse button to fire
